title: Mars Transit in the 1st House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 1st house for Sagittarius Ascendant, energy, drive, and assertiveness rise sharply. Physical vitality increases, along with the urge to act independently and take initiative. Confidence turns action-oriented, but impatience or impulsive reactions can surface if energy is unmanaged. This phase favors bold starts, leadership, and competitive pursuits. When directed with discipline, it strengthens courage, decisiveness, and the ability to assert personal goals without unnecessary conflict.
closing: This Mars transit fuels confidence and action. With discipline, it becomes a powerful phase for leadership, courage, and decisive new beginnings.
